Tom is a young guy living his dream of being a reporter, he is working a an intern at the paper he is inspiring to work at. He is 24 years old, 5 foot 10", light brown haired, of average size around 160 lbs with good looks, lives alone with his cat, Felix, and is currently too busy with work to do anything else in his life.

On this cold autumn morning, Tom is getting up bright and early at around 5, preparing the food for the cat, and ironing his shirt for today's day at the office. Running a bit late, i might add, as he is ironing with a bit of toast in his mouth, little did he know, there was a team of people right outside his apartment complex, waiting on him.

- - - - - - - -- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -- -- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

"Josh, do you think he left already? he seams to be running quite late today." said a young slim scientist to the other more larger one, "No Mitch, he is in there and about to come out any minute, just you wait." replied the larger one, "just be patient, he will be out, and when he is, we will nab him in a sac." e continued, holding the sac in his hands while making sure that most of him was covered by the bush he was standing behind of. Not that the bush seamed to do much, he was after all wearing a white lab coat in broad day light.

- - - - - -- - - - - - - - - -- - -- - - -- - - - - -- - - - - - - -- -- - - - - - - -- - -- - - -

With the cat fed and his shirt ironed, our main man walks out the door and down the stairs to exit the building, not remotely thinking of the possibility of a couple of scientist waiting for him out side.
As he exits the building the two scientist, Josh and Mitch, tackle and bag Tom, Mitch used to play american football, not all scientist hate sport.

Winded and caught by surprise, our main man Tom was helpless as the duo carried him into their van and drove off to an unknown location. Josh riding in the back seat sedated the guest to ensure a smooth and peaceful journey.

Hours later, as Tom regains his senses, he finds him self...

11.content:
Tom looks around. He struggles to move and finds that he is strapped on what seems to be an examination table. Bright flourescent lights over head are making it hard for him to see the rest of the room.
"Hey," he calls out. "What's going on?" His voice echoes around the room with no response. He pauses to think about what had brought him to this room. He couldn't remember. Then he began to question some more. Who was he. He didn't know his name, where he lived or anything else. Just then he heard the sound of a door being opened and footsteps heading his way.
"Oh, I'm so sorry." the voice echoed from behind his. "I was checking on my computer in the other room." A slender young man reached over Toms body and started to unstrap him.
"Sorry about this but you were unconscious and I didn't want you to fall off the table. We couldn't find anything wrong so we hoped that you would wake up."
"What Happened to me?" Tom was feeling a little better with the straps off but he didn't know where he was, why he was here or even who he was and he wasn't sure that he could trust this guy, even if he did seem helpful.
"My name is Mitch by the way." He held out a hand to Tom who was struggling to sit up. "Steady there, you may be dizzy. We found you passed out in the lobby and brought you up here. Do you work here?"
"Uhh, No," Tom answered. "At least I don't think so. I don't really know...." Tom faded off as he struggled to complete the sentence.
"Don't worry." Mitch replied. "It will probably come back to you. Meanwhile I think you should probably sit down until we figure out what happened."
"So far, so good." Mitch was thinking. The amnesia drug had wiped out Tom's memory. Now to get the rest of the plan going."
"Let's check your ID." Mitch suggested.
Tom reached in his pocket and pulled out a wallet. He checked the drivers license. His name was Caleb Fergison. That didn't seem familiar.
"Let me check.' Mitch took the license and left the room. Tom/Caleb was left alone but not for long. Soon the door opened and Mitch was back and this time he was not alone. Behind the slender Mitch was a taller, bulkier guy. Seeing Tom, the big guy smiled broadly and called out.
"Caleb, We've been looking all over for you."
I work for the University

111.content:
"I work for the university and was waiting for you to begin your training. You are a new intern in a research project we are doing. We were worried. Are you all right?"
"I think so."Tom said slowly, "But I don't remember anything about a job or the university and I don't even know your name."
"First things first, Caleb." The big guy smiled at Tom. "My name is Hal and you will be working with me on the research. You were really excited about it because you wanted to go for a Masters and this experience would look good on an application. Remember now?"
Tom couldn't remember anything about a job or even his name but somehow his mind began to accept what he was being told. Caleb began to feel like his name and he did want to work on a research project.
Mitch was pleased. Tom seemed to be accepting the new story about his identity just like they had hoped. Now to see how the other parts of the experiment were working. First, Tom had received a drug to block the inhibitions to eating. He should no longer recognize that he was full and keep eating. Second there was a drug to enhance his sense of smell and taste to make food more appealing. They needed their subject to be a willing eater and once that was established they would begin to test the rest of the experiment.

"Don't you remember, buddy?" Hal boomed as he slapped 'Caleb' on the back, almost knocking the poor boy over.

Now, Caleb really couldn't remember a thing he looked down to see a nylon t-shirt tucked into some elastic waist shorts, and seeing his now hairless body, "have I always looked so boyish?" he thought to himself. He stuttered a no before Hal cut him off "well you're here to see the affects of obesity on young men" he said as we warped his arm around the impressionable young man and led him off to another room.

Caleb looked at the two men and wondered momentarily why he would agree to such a thing, but didn't really question it; he was putty in their hands thanks to the drugs they'd used, they could reprogram him into their obedient little lab rat...

It teased like creamy and felt thick, Caleb drank it all up, just like the good boy they where training him to be.

11112.content:
As morning approaches Caleb stirs in his sleep...

"uurg" Caleb moans as he stirs awake, raising both hands to his head.
"oh, my head!" feeling a banging headache, like he had been drinks last night and was left with the worst hang-over. Caleb opens his eye to take in his surroundings, confirming that he is still in the research facility, white walls, white lights, white bed and white bed clothes.

He lies on the bed for a while, not really feeling the energy to move, still nursing his head hoping that what ever force was trying to pry it open would give up eventually.

Lazily he moved a hand down to his stomach, it was curiously met with a soft cushion. He played with the said cushion for a minute or two before realising it was part of him, feeling the sensation of moving a part of his own body.

He put his hand under the bed sheet to get a better feel, still not feeling up to moving his head or his other hand, as his hand slipped under this sheet, he came in contact with the "cushion" a lot sooner than he thought he would, feeling how soft and warm it felt, tracing his way to the middle of it with his index finger. He couldn't help but notice how much warmer he was getting as he kept tracing his finger around.
Arrived at the middle, his finger fell into a hole, he could feel that half the finger was now incased in the warm and soft mass, then it clicked, that was his belly.

"Oh my god" Caleb shouted in a wave of panic as he thrusts the sheet into the air revealing his body from the soft white sheets. He quickly sat upright "urgh!" feeling the pain in his head as he does so, looking down at his form, also taking a lot of effort to sit up. Gazing down at what once was his flat stomach, now sits a sizeable bit of chub, folding over and spilling onto his lap a little, grabbing it with both hands trying to contain it, but just causing it to jiggle.

*Door Opens*

"Caleb are you alright? We heard you yell?!" Mitch said has he entered the room, clipboard at the ready.

Caleb just sat there in silence, holding onto his belly, confused and alarmed.

"I see we are making progress!" Notes down Mitch as he approaches the bed.
"Are you shocked of the results of the serum you took last night? I say we couldn't be prouder!
Tell me, how do you feel?" Mitch holding up his clipboard attentively awaiting Caleb's feedback.

"urgh, I feel awful, feels like I partied too hard last night! Banging headache!" raising a hand to his head, noticing that he is not sweating a bit.
"and is it me or is it really hot in here?" He said as he wiped his brow.

"A Headache you say? And you feel warm?" said Mitch as he looks down at his clipboard and scribbles in a few notes, flipping through pages at the back.
"Ah, don't worry, everything is under control, your headache will disappear in the next hours or so. If you wouldn't mind though getting up and coming over here to the scale so we can assess the success of the serum." Mitch lent a hand to Caleb helping him off the bed and ushering him to the scale in the corner of the room, which had a mirror in front of it.

Caleb felt heavy, feeling his body jiggle a bit with every step, noticing how tight his underwear felt, hearing his steps thunder a bit as he went.

Once in front of the mirror Caleb gasped, he was a site, he felt heavy and he looked heavy!
His face filled out a bit, he had a small double chin, his pecs were now small moobs, his arms were thicker, his belly was big and wide, followed by some wide hips and thick thighs.
He looks like he must have put on 80lbs!

He started to run his hands around his form, looking down at it and taking a closer look at his fat, it was soft, a lot softer than it look, feeling it's weight, raising it, letting it back down, grabbing his belly and noticing stretch marks in the middle, running all along the side onto his sizeable and wide love handles. Following them down to his back where he was met with his sizeable ass, his cheeks were big! No wonder his hips are wide, that ass filled his underwear to the max, testing the fabrics elasticity.

*Beep Beep* A noise under his feet indicated the scale was don't measuring.
253lb in big red letter read in the display.
{93lb gain!} Caleb thinks to him self
{I'm so fat now! I wonder if it'll stop here or if they ask me to take more serum?} Jiggling his love handle noticing it's getting rather sweaty
{so so so warm in here, I wish there was a window} he thinks as he looks around the room, catching Mitch in the act of staring at his ass.

Mitch was busy writing notes down in his clipboard and staring at Caleb's rather large behind, the noise broke his gaze at Caleb's ass.
"Erm, Marvelous progress! Well Done Caleb" Mitch stumbles to congratulated Caleb.

{Was he just checking me out?} Caleb thinks to him self feeling his face turning a little red as he blushes.

"But we haven't finished yet, your body temperature should increase until further effects of the serum take place, that is why you have a headache and your getting warmer" Just as Mitch said those words...
*Beep Beep*
The scale beeps again.

11121.content:
Caleb now sat in Hal's lab, a floor below to the one he woke up in, about to be injected with some groundbreaking experimental drug created by someone he can't seem to remember. As alarm bell rang off in Caleb's mind, he clearly chose to ignore them, as he put his arm out to Hal to receive the first dose.

Feeling the sting, the rush from the foreign substance in his body and then lights out happened all within a minute. Caleb fell like a mannequin on the floor from the chair he was sat on with a thud.

-------------------

Hal couldn't believe how well this was going, Caleb was accepting his new role as assistant/lab-rat and had not yet remembered anything that would complicate things.
Well I mean, shame he hit the floor as he passed out, but these things happen.

Hal picks Caleb up off the floor and lays him down on the sofa in the lab, gives him another 5 different shots (might as well while he is out cold) and returns to his paperwork, waiting for his lab-rat to wake up so he can monitor the effects.

--------------------

Caleb awoke a few hours later, his head hurt a little bit, he did remember falling and even though it doesn't hurt that much, he thought it would be wise to stay laying down.
"Hey Hal, how long was I out for?" Caleb asks Hal, who is sitting at a near by computer terminal.
"About a few hours, sorry for the fall, I didn't expect the drug to make you pass out" apologised Hal

As Caleb laid in silence on the sofa, a loud nice erupted from his slim midsection.
"I guess you must be hungry Caleb, help your self to the fridge in the hall"

Caleb carefully got up and walked to the fridge, finding it rather full of tasty looking treats. Being a sweets man, Caleb grabs a large creamy trifle and a spoon for the near by cutlery drawer and goes back to sit on the sofa, taking a spoonful of the dessert on the way.

The taste and texture totally blew Caleb's mind, it was like nothing he'd ever tasted, even though it looked store bought. Puzzled a little bit, worried non, our hero plows through the trifle at an alarming rate, guess he was hungry after all.

Hal made appropriate notes as he observed caleb from security camera feed on his computer, so to not look like he was staring, feeling a bit proud as the serums he created seem to be doing their job.
______________

Feeling a little bit satisfied, after eating the large trifle, Caleb starts to feel a little bit sleepy, so he puts the dish down on the floor and lays down on the sofa, resting a hand on his bloated gut. As he lays there his stomach starts to make some loud noises, like gurgling, but Caleb hardly notices as he drifts off to sleep...

111222.content:
Tom rushed back and served himself a huge plate of savory chicken and dumplings.
Hal chuckled at Tom's furtive demeanor. He kept looking to the side as if to see if anyone might steal the food from him. He looked a bit like a starving dog. The treatment seemed to be working and the aroma of the chicken seemed to win over the casserole. Hal suspected that his new drugs would help Tom transition easily to Caleb and Hal had plans to provide Caleb with all the proper information to facilitate this.

Caleb was finishing the third piece of stewed chicken and was wiping up the sauce with a dumpling.He looked up furtively and checked to see if anyone was looking.

"Show time." Hal announced to the crew. "I'm going in."

Caleb looked up when Hal entered and tried to hide the plate. Sauce was dripping from his chin onto his shirt front.

"What' the idea?' he asked.
Caleb looked embarrassed. "I smelled that food and I just couldn't stop eating. I'm sorry. I don't know.. it sure tasted good."
"You know that was lunch for the volunteers. I never thought you would help yourself. You always such a pig?"
"I''m really sorry. It's not like me really. I swear I never smelled anything so good. I didn't eat that much."
"Not much? You ate half of the chicken. You think that's not much?"
"Well, there isn't enough for the volunteers now. You happy, pig?"
Hal gave Caleb a disgusted look and left the room. Then he returned to the observation room and watched.
For a time Caleb sat but then started looking furtively at the food.
